CN.content:

Paragraph: 15 In the Jen group , a hole mobility of 0.029 cm^2 V -1 S^-1 and a PCE of 6.2% were reported in a copolymer that contained an indacenodithiophene ( IDT ) unit and a phenanthrenequinoxaline unit.

| copolymer containing an indacenodithiophene (IDT) unit and a phenanthrenequinoxaline unit |

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties. "In the Jen group" and "a copolymer" do not refer to specific material properties, but rather provide contextual information about where and what the reported properties belong to.
